original_title: Regarding the Pain of Susan Sontag (Notes on Camp)
overview: Continues the journey from the final sequence of Ask the Insects. We turn away from the graveyard, enter the schoolyard, approach the old crippled tree spinning and sit under it to draw a little cartoon for the New Yorker, while — through some sort of temporal displacement — New Year’s resolutions are being made.
title: Regarding the Pain of Susan Sontag (Notes on Camp)
